title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.10 - Allowance for mares
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.10 - Allowance for mares

State Regulations

Except in handicaps and in races where the conditions
expressly state to the contrary, mares shall be allowed five pounds before

September 1st and three pounds afterwards. There shall be no sex allowance for
geldings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4054.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
